creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Butler
inscription:
Inscription
Inscription on canvas verso: [J. B. Rread / The Artist / 1856] (The inscription is on a new lining canvas, likely copied from the original, albeit incorrectly.)
provenance:
(Anne Kerr Antiques, Minneapolis, Minnesota); Patrick and Aimee Butler, St. Paul, Minnesota; [1] gift to MIA in 1977.

[1] Note in curatorial file states that Mrs. Butler purchased the work directly from Anne Kerr Antiques.
title: Portrait of a Boy
